channel.title: [508] unsupported item [508]
channel.description:
Hi everyone. Im currently trying to make dragon claws in my 508 server (client). I dont have the models for the dragon claws so im using rune claws, but theres a problem with it. When I wield the rune claws in my run.bat it says "Unsupported item: 3101" (3101 = claws ID) and it wont wield the claws. btw thats the server run.bat not client. It happens with all claws and some other weapons also. I was wondering if anyone knew why this is happening. Please reply, thanks.
P.S. If anyone has the models for dragon claws you can post them here :P
